S.FORM: == Su-wa 蘇瓦 == Su-wa " Pei-ci kamu :Suva, kanatal a ngalnganl: ('suβa) u Pei-ci a suo-tu, u satabakiay a tukay nu Pei-ci. Su-wa itida i Wi-ti-subal a wali timulan, u teban nu kitidaan, tademaw makaala tu 77,366 ku tademaw. caywalpicpic mihcaan , Su-wa tatengan mala Pei-ci a suo-tu, katukuh i tusepcaypic mihcaan nipikisaan tu tademawan, Su-wa tademaw hakiya makaala tu 93,970 ku tademawan, pasu misitekeday nu inakaan a niyadu'an a tabakiay nu tukayan tademaw makaala tu 185,913 a tademawan. Su-wa atu malalitinay a Pei-ci La-mi, Na-si-nu atu C-suo-li a tukayan pulung nu tademaw hakiya makaala tu 330,000 nu tademawan, milakuuyt tu pulung nu kanatal malatulu nu cacayan a tademawan. 蘇瓦(斐濟語:Suva,國際音標:('suβa)) . tawya, Su-wa u Pei-ci a cen-ce, sin-cen, sakaudip atu tatelungan nu lalangawan, micapi tu aydaay nu mihcaan madih tu ku nalimaan atu sapaadih tu katuuday ni miuingay, u Nan-tay-pin-yeng a sakaudip atu kalimulakan nu lalangawan, yadahay nu kanatalan a kusi, kanatal a kakulian atu aenengan nu tapan itida namin tina tukayan. 當前, . likisi 歷史 caywalnemwal mihcaan, Su-wa nuw adidi'ay henay a niyadu'an, Pa-u kuo-wan tumuk ci Say-lu.Ay-pey-ni-sa. Sa-kung-paw pahiya tu 5,000 pin-hun-kun-li a lala' sipabeli i hunbu itida i Aw-ta-li-ya a Puo-li-ni-si-ya kuse, sapaliyun tu nina kuse tu nakamuan nida tu sapatadah sa.caywalpicsipmihcaan, Pei-ci malaIng-kuo a kabulawan nu kitdaan. cawwalpicpic mihcaan kabulawan nu kitidaan pabalucu' tu suotu namaka Lei-u'-ka malimad taydan i Su-wa, Hun-cya kuncense a FE Pratt sakakaay i caywalpiclim mihcaan sipatudu' cinidaan tu pulung nu miditekay a tademaw han, itida i W. Stephen atu RW Stewart nipiedapan a misiki tu Su-wa a tukay nu kiyakuan. 1868年, FE Pratt W. Stephens和RW Stewart . saan caysiwsepsiw mihcaan a " siciw huli a cudadan" Su-wa caysiwcaysep mihcaan maala tu sakalihalay nu kitidaan, katukuh i caysiwlimtu mihcaan, Su-wa pulungen nida ku Mu'-a-ni-kaw atu Sa-ma-pu-la niyadu'an, lala' misaahebal katukuh tu caylu pinhung-kunli, lala' nu kitidaan makaala tu cay pinhung-kunli. taway a mihcaan nu cacay a bataan bulad, Su-wa palatatengaay tu nipatuudan a tukayan, mala Pei-ci a sakacacay nu tukay. Su-wa itida i tusepseplu mihcaan sikawaw tu Nan-tay-ping-yeng piyunduan, uyni a nikasetsetan a kawaw nu sepat a bataan nu likisian a sakatulu nu sikawawan. mamisilud tina kawawan, Pei-ci itini i Cung-kuo sihu aniedapan tu kalisiwan makaala tu 1600 wang nu Amilika a kalisiw, miedap tu nipatideng tu baluhay a ayundean, ilabu nu tatelungan nu lumaan, ngangaduyan, kakadubaan, mammalian atu aadihan nu tademaw. 根據1909年的" . kitidaan 地理 Su-wa itida i Wi-ti-subal wali timu nu masadicumay a buyu' nu subalan a niyadu'an, itida i Law-ka-la-wan atu Su-wa minatuan nu laadan. amis atu tipan a buyu'an misuayaw tu wali timul nu balian, sisa tu mihcaan kapah ku nikasinanuman, tukay atu nisangaan tu luma' ayda atu nikabulawan nu sangan tu lamu'an milecad. amica ku Su-wa itida i hangbung nu subalan liklik mamin lawaan nu bayu', nika tepal nu dadipasan u sumanahay a kilakilangan, micapiay nu bayuan itida i sepat a bataan kun-li nu Tay-pin-yeng minatu. . deimad 氣候 saan ku nikasasiduma nu dimiadan, Su-wa u kacaledesan nu siudaday a dimiadan. u puu' nu balian atu alahican nu masaliyutay nu balian, Su-wa caay kaw u ce'-taw a dimiadan. mihmihcaan idaw ku nanum nu Su-wa, inai' ku kelah nu puu'an, caay pisaba tu cacay a buladan nu nikahetikan tu udad nu 60 hawmi. Su-wa nikahetikan nu udad makaala tu 3,000 hawmi. saacakay han i pituay a buladan, nikahetikan tu udad 125 hawmi, malecad tu kacaledesan nu demiadan a tukayan, tu mihmihcaan mahida tu ku demiad nu Su-wa, satalakaway makaala tu 28°C, sasabaay nu demiadan makaala tu 22°C. 28°C,平均最低溫度約為 22°C. Su-wa a nikaudadan mikikaka tu Nan-ti atu Wi-ti subal nitipan. sakamusa nu ayawan Ing-ku Pei-ci cungtu ci Ya-se.sin-men-cei-se sakamusa, caay henay pakaadih tu Su-wa-na nu mahidaay a udadan, caay kahedek ku nika udadan, sabaw tu cacay bulad katukuh tu lima bulad a nikaudadan u sayadahay, enem bulad katukuh cacay a bataan a bulad u sapi'ay a bulad caay ka hinaudad. . A-e-puo-te' kunyen 阿爾伯特公園 Su-wa yadah ku kuying atu balubaluan a kuyeng. itida i macimacian a A-e-puo-te' kunyen u Pei-ci likisian nu sapakaadih nu kitidaan a nika singangan. tawya teban nu San-u kitidaan a Su-tan kunyen sakanamuhan a tataydan midang, pilipilipayan idaw tu ku miuingay atu kawaw. Se-se-tun balubaluan a kunyen u macimacian nu tapang a kilakilangan, u Pei-ci puo-u-kun a niyadu'an. Yi-li-sa-pay niwan dadan miduduc tu Su-wa nuayawan a caculilan, katuuday nu binawlan tayda namin itida tina Ke-luo-su-wa kilakilangan a kunyen miyunsuku, mingaduy atu miadih tu ayaw nu kawawan. . tademaw 人口 Su-wa yadahay nu binacadan atu yadahay nu lalangawan a tukay, tada kamu u igu, nika Pai-ci kamu, Ing-tu-se-ta kamu atu duma nu Ing-tu kamu u tada kamu nu heni. itidaay a Pei-ci tademaw atu In-tu iluc nu Pei-ci binacadan mikiyadah tu Su-wa tademaw, ina tukay u Pei-ci ku katuuday nu tademawan, pasu Luo-tu-man tademaw, Law-an tademaw, Lan-pi-ya tademaw, Kaw-cya-suo tademaw, u iluc nu O-cuo atu Han tademaw, micapi tu aydaay a mihcaan Tay-pin-yeng nu malimaday a tademaw tayni i tini, baluhay nu binacadan itini i tukay atu sin-cen niyadu'an mikuli atu maudip. . caculilan 交通 Ce-suo-li kantal pahikukian u Pai-ci a sakatusa nu tabakiay a pahukukian, itida i Su-wa a wal amis nu 23 kunli, tapang sakay milihida tu iciban nu kanatal, Su-wa atu Pai-ci a duma nu pahikukian Na-di palaliten tu pahikukian, namaka tusepcaysep mihcaan walu bulad, Pei-ci pahikukian paylipay tusa a hikukian namaka Ce-suo-li kanatal nu pahikukian mibahel pasayda i Aw-ke-lan a hikukian, nina pahikukian sibiyaw tu Tun-cya, Tu-wa-lu atu Wan-na-tu ku sapatahekal midiput. nanum han Su-wa u Pai-ci tapang a minatu, yadah ku balunga sipicukaymas nu taydaay a midang. kanatal nu balungaan atu yiw-lun musaluimeng itida i Su-wa kuowan a minatuan. .

== So-wa 蘇瓦 == So-wa " Pei-ci kamo :Sova, kanatal a ngalnganl: ('soβa) o Pei-ci a soo-to, o satabakiay a tokay no Pei-ci. So-wa itida i Wi-ti-sobal a wali timolan, o teban no kitidaan, tademaw makaala to 77,366 ko tademaw. caywalpicpic mihcaan , So-wa tatengan mala Pei-ci a soo-to, katokoh i tosepcaypic mihcaan nipikisaan to tademawan, So-wa tademaw hakiya makaala to 93,970 ko tademawan, paso misitekeday no inakaan a niyado'an a tabakiay no tokayan tademaw makaala to 185,913 a tademawan. So-wa ato malalitinay a Pei-ci La-mi, Na-si-no ato C-soo-li a tokayan polong no tademaw hakiya makaala to 330,000 no tademawan, milakooyt to polong no kanatal malatolo no cacayan a tademawan. 蘇瓦(斐濟語:Sova,國際音標:('soβa)) . tawya, So-wa o Pei-ci a cen-ce, sin-cen, sakaodip ato tatelongan no lalangawan, micapi to aydaay no mihcaan madih to ko nalimaan ato sapaadih to katooday ni mioingay, o Nan-tay-pin-yeng a sakaodip ato kalimolakan no lalangawan, yadahay no kanatalan a kosi, kanatal a kakolian ato aenengan no tapan itida namin tina tokayan. 當前, . likisi 歷史 caywalnemwal mihcaan, So-wa now adidi'ay henay a niyado'an, Pa-o koo-wan tomok ci Say-lo.Ay-pey-ni-sa. Sa-kong-paw pahiya to 5,000 pin-hon-kon-li a lala' sipabeli i honbo itida i Aw-ta-li-ya a Poo-li-ni-si-ya kose, sapaliyon to nina kose to nakamoan nida to sapatadah sa.caywalpicsipmihcaan, Pei-ci malaIng-koo a kabolawan no kitdaan. cawwalpicpic mihcaan kabolawan no kitidaan pabaloco' to sooto namaka Lei-o'-ka malimad taydan i So-wa, Hon-cya koncense a FE Pratt sakakaay i caywalpiclim mihcaan sipatodo' cinidaan to polong no miditekay a tademaw han, itida i W. Stephen ato RW Stewart nipiedapan a misiki to So-wa a tokay no kiyakoan. 1868年, FE Pratt W. Stephens和RW Stewart . saan caysiwsepsiw mihcaan a " siciw holi a codadan" So-wa caysiwcaysep mihcaan maala to sakalihalay no kitidaan, katokoh i caysiwlimto mihcaan, So-wa polongen nida ko Mo'-a-ni-kaw ato Sa-ma-po-la niyado'an, lala' misaahebal katokoh to caylo pinhong-konli, lala' no kitidaan makaala to cay pinhong-konli. taway a mihcaan no cacay a bataan bolad, So-wa palatatengaay to nipatoodan a tokayan, mala Pei-ci a sakacacay no tokay. So-wa itida i tosepseplo mihcaan sikawaw to Nan-tay-ping-yeng piyondoan, oyni a nikasetsetan a kawaw no sepat a bataan no likisian a sakatolo no sikawawan. mamisilod tina kawawan, Pei-ci itini i Cong-koo siho aniedapan to kalisiwan makaala to 1600 wang no Amilika a kalisiw, miedap to nipatideng to balohay a ayondean, ilabo no tatelongan no lomaan, ngangadoyan, kakadobaan, mammalian ato aadihan no tademaw. 根據1909年的" . kitidaan 地理 So-wa itida i Wi-ti-sobal wali timo no masadicomay a boyo' no sobalan a niyado'an, itida i Law-ka-la-wan ato So-wa minatoan no laadan. amis ato tipan a boyo'an misoayaw to wali timol no balian, sisa to mihcaan kapah ko nikasinanoman, tokay ato nisangaan to loma' ayda ato nikabolawan no sangan to lamo'an milecad. amica ko So-wa itida i hangbong no sobalan liklik mamin lawaan no bayo', nika tepal no dadipasan o somanahay a kilakilangan, micapiay no bayoan itida i sepat a bataan kon-li no Tay-pin-yeng minato. . deimad 氣候 saan ko nikasasidoma no dimiadan, So-wa o kacaledesan no siodaday a dimiadan. o poo' no balian ato alahican no masaliyotay no balian, So-wa caay kaw o ce'-taw a dimiadan. mihmihcaan idaw ko nanom no So-wa, inai' ko kelah no poo'an, caay pisaba to cacay a boladan no nikahetikan to odad no 60 hawmi. So-wa nikahetikan no odad makaala to 3,000 hawmi. saacakay han i pitoay a boladan, nikahetikan to odad 125 hawmi, malecad to kacaledesan no demiadan a tokayan, to mihmihcaan mahida to ko demiad no So-wa, satalakaway makaala to 28°C, sasabaay no demiadan makaala to 22°C. 28°C,平均最低溫度約為 22°C. So-wa a nikaodadan mikikaka to Nan-ti ato Wi-ti sobal nitipan. sakamosa no ayawan Ing-ko Pei-ci congto ci Ya-se.sin-men-cei-se sakamosa, caay henay pakaadih to So-wa-na no mahidaay a odadan, caay kahedek ko nika odadan, sabaw to cacay bolad katokoh to lima bolad a nikaodadan o sayadahay, enem bolad katokoh cacay a bataan a bolad o sapi'ay a bolad caay ka hinaodad. . A-e-poo-te' konyen 阿爾伯特公園 So-wa yadah ko koying ato balobaloan a koyeng. itida i macimacian a A-e-poo-te' konyen o Pei-ci likisian no sapakaadih no kitidaan a nika singangan. tawya teban no San-o kitidaan a So-tan konyen sakanamohan a tataydan midang, pilipilipayan idaw to ko mioingay ato kawaw. Se-se-ton balobaloan a konyen o macimacian no tapang a kilakilangan, o Pei-ci poo-o-kon a niyado'an. Yi-li-sa-pay niwan dadan midodoc to So-wa noayawan a cacolilan, katooday no binawlan tayda namin itida tina Ke-loo-so-wa kilakilangan a konyen miyonsoko, mingadoy ato miadih to ayaw no kawawan. . tademaw 人口 So-wa yadahay no binacadan ato yadahay no lalangawan a tokay, tada kamo o igo, nika Pai-ci kamo, Ing-to-se-ta kamo ato doma no Ing-to kamo o tada kamo no heni. itidaay a Pei-ci tademaw ato In-to iloc no Pei-ci binacadan mikiyadah to So-wa tademaw, ina tokay o Pei-ci ko katooday no tademawan, paso Loo-to-man tademaw, Law-an tademaw, Lan-pi-ya tademaw, Kaw-cya-soo tademaw, o iloc no O-coo ato Han tademaw, micapi to aydaay a mihcaan Tay-pin-yeng no malimaday a tademaw tayni i tini, balohay no binacadan itini i tokay ato sin-cen niyado'an mikoli ato maodip. . cacolilan 交通 Ce-soo-li kantal pahikokian o Pai-ci a sakatosa no tabakiay a pahokokian, itida i So-wa a wal amis no 23 konli, tapang sakay milihida to iciban no kanatal, So-wa ato Pai-ci a doma no pahikokian Na-di palaliten to pahikokian, namaka tosepcaysep mihcaan walo bolad, Pei-ci pahikokian paylipay tosa a hikokian namaka Ce-soo-li kanatal no pahikokian mibahel pasayda i Aw-ke-lan a hikokian, nina pahikokian sibiyaw to Ton-cya, To-wa-lo ato Wan-na-to ko sapatahekal midipot. nanom han So-wa o Pai-ci tapang a minato, yadah ko balonga sipicokaymas no taydaay a midang. kanatal no balongaan ato yiw-lon mosaloimeng itida i So-wa koowan a minatoan. .
